briefTitle: The Role of Diet and Lifestyle in Breast Cancer Survival
officialTitle: The Role of Diet, Complementary Treatment and Lifestyle in Breast Cancer Progression and Survival
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To assess the association between phytoestrogens and relapse free survival
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women with histologically confirmed invasive primary breast cancer grades I to III.
* age up to and including 75 years old

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous cancer with the exception of basal cell carcinoma
* Concomitant primary cancer
* Bilateral cancer of the breast
* Psychological problems
* Cognitive impairment
* Poor understanding of English
